enhanced_by.reason: The getMatchingOptions method relies on the state of the longOpts map, which is populated by the addOption method.
The addOptionGroup method indirectly affects the longOpts map through the addOption method, which is called within it.
Both methods involve checking the presence of options in the longOpts map, making hasLongOption a suitable method for constructing assertions.
The getOption method retrieves an option from the shortOpts or longOpts maps, which can be used to verify the correctness of the matching options returned by getMatchingOptions.
